historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-109.

1973 Ed., § 47-109.

DC CODE § 47-109

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: On and after July 1, 1935, appropriations for the District of Columbia appearing on the books of the government and listed in subsection (b) of this section are abolished as such, and so much of the several acts as provide for such appropriations is amended so as to authorize in lieu thereof annual definite appropriations, estimates for which shall be incorporated in the estimates of annual appropriations for the District of Columbia.
(1) Refunding water rents, and so forth, District of Columbia (DCx602).
Extension, and so forth, of streets and avenues, District of Columbia (fiscal year) (DCx114).
Policemen and Firemen's Relief Fund, District of Columbia (DCt614).

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
